component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
sortBy false java.lang.Object Property to be used when sorting this column either on client side or server side with ajax.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean false Boolean to make the column width resizable, default is false
parser false java.lang.String
Type of parser used to identify the type of data presented in the column.
width false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE
Width of column in pixels.
styleClass false java.lang.String
Style class of the column.
sortFunction false javax.el.MethodExpression java.lang.Integer sort(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object) Custom pluggable sort function, for dynamic data it refers to a methodexpression and for non-dynamic data it must be a javascript method.
filterBy false java.lang.Object false Property to be used when sorting this column either on client side or server side with ajax.
filterStyle false java.lang.String Style of the input text filter.
filterStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the input text filter.
filterEvent false java.lang.String keyup Style class of the input text filter.
